question: Create a simple HTML page with title 'Welcome', heading 'Welcome to Ratan sir classes', and a paragraph 'This is my first HTML document by Your Name.'
sampleInput:
Title          => Welcome
Heading  => Welcome to Ratan sir classes
Para         => This is my first HTML document by Your Name.
answer:
Welcome to Ratan sir classes

This is my first HTML document by Your Name.
sampleOutput:
Welcome
Welcome to Ratan sir classes
This is my first HTML document by Your Name.
description: Description of the task to be performed.

question: Create an HTML document with a heading 'About Me' and two paragraphs describing yourself.
sampleInput:
Heading-> About Me
Para1-> I am learning HTML.
Para2-> I love coding.
answer:
About Me

I am learning HTML.

I love coding.
sampleOutput:
About Me
I am learning HTML.
I love coding.
description: Description of the task to be performed.

question: Create an HTML page with title 'My Hobbies' and an unordered list containing three hobbies.
sampleInput:
Title-> My Hobbies
Hobby1-> Reading
Hobby2-> Coding
Hobby3-> Playing Cricket
sampleOutput:
My Hobbies
• Reading
• Coding
• Playing Cricket

question: Create an HTML page with title 'My Image' and display an image from source 'mypic.jpg' with width 200px.

Image-> mypic.jpg
Width-> 200px
description: create image tag with given source and width.
